title: Advanced diesel from ethanol: a pathway to produce sustainable and high-quality drop-in biofuels
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00943F, Paper
Juan-Manuel Restrepo-Flórez, Javier E. Chavarrio, Emmanuel Canales, Dustin Witkowski, Srinath Subramanian, Paolo Cuello-Peñaloza, David A. Rothamer, Christos T. Maravelias, George W. Huber
In this work, we develop a novel technology for the transformation of ethanol into diesel via Guerbet coupling and etherification.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
